dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:12,000,000 (W 15--E 55/N 55--N 25). Shows the Roman Empire, A.D. 1-300 and the development of the Roman Empire, B.C. 218-A.D. 100. Pub. date cf. Mapping the classical world / Richard J.A. Talbert in Journal of Roman archaeology, volume 5 (1992). In lower right corner of map: J.G. Bartholomew. Map pasted in red cloth case with index (8 pages) bound in. Murray file copy no. 182.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: Rome History Empire, 30 b.c. 284 a.d. Maps
